description: Product of binomial coefficients C(n,j) from j=0 to Floor[n/2].
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,97
formula: For odd n, a(n)=Sqrt[A001142(n)], for even n, [a(n)^2]/A001405(n)=A001142(n).
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 97, write("b061778.txt", n, " ", prod(j=0, n\2, binomial(n, j))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 27 2009]
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 22 2001
